passions.keywords: roelof, jan, elsinga, portfolio, work, development, design, passions, articles
passions.description: Here you can read about the things I do in my free-time. Unlike my blog posts about my professional development, these are about the other good things in life. My job keeps me glued to my computer for at least 8 hours per day so I try to find activities that have nothing to do with that.
passions.author: Roelof Jan Elsinga
passions.title: My passions
